comments.author: michal.novotny@gmail.com
comments.text: For a test of bug 632835 we need to be able to delay responses of some requests while not blocking the others.
comments.raw_text: For a test of bug 632835 we need to be able to delay responses of some requests while not blocking the others.
comments.creator: michal.novotny@gmail.com

comments.author: jwalden@mit.edu
comments.creator: jwalden@mit.edu
comments.raw_text: You can do this manually right now by having the responses use saved state to decide the order in which to send data.  It's a little tricky, but it's entirely doable.
comments.text: You can do this manually right now by having the responses use saved state to decide the order in which to send data.  It's a little tricky, but it's entirely doable.
